trans-unit.source: #12: Add request cache for index results to all UnIndex subclasses.
trans-unit.target: #12: Add request cache for index results to all UnIndex subclasses.

trans-unit.source: #13: Deal with threshold value of None in add/delColum.
trans-unit.target: #13: Deal with threshold value of None in add/delColum.

trans-unit.source: #19: Fix stale cache results after clearing an index.
trans-unit.target: #19: Fix stale cache results after clearing an index.

trans-unit.source: #5: Ignore None values in UnIndex instead of raising a TypeError.
trans-unit.target: #5: Ignore None values in UnIndex instead of raising a TypeError.

trans-unit.source: #6, #7, #11: Run ZODB cache garbage collection during queries.
trans-unit.target: #6, #7, #11: Run ZODB cache garbage collection during queries.

trans-unit.source: , which allows one to load a plan from a file, instead of a module via an environment var.
trans-unit.target: , which allows one to load a plan from a file, instead of a module via an environment var.

trans-unit.source: . Fixes an issue on a ZMI redirect after rebuilding the catalog.
trans-unit.target: . Fixes an issue on a ZMI redirect after rebuilding the catalog.

trans-unit.source: . It stores document ids as keys, which can only be ints.
trans-unit.target: . It stores document ids as keys, which can only be ints.

trans-unit.source: . Note that negative filtering on an index still restricts items to those having a value in the index. So with 10 documents, 5 of them in the
trans-unit.target: . Note that negative filtering on an index still restricts items to those having a value in the index. So with 10 documents, 5 of them in the

trans-unit.source: . The indexed value will determine the smaller set automatically and choose its best value. An inline switch is done once the indexed value set grows larger than 60% of the total length. 60% was chosen to avoid constant switching for indexes that have an almost equal distribution of
trans-unit.target: . The indexed value will determine the smaller set automatically and choose its best value. An inline switch is done once the indexed value set grows larger than 60% of the total length. 60% was chosen to avoid constant switching for indexes that have an almost equal distribution of

trans-unit.source: . The responsibility for parsing and skipping the query has moved into the catalog, and the return value no longer has to be a tuple of (result, used_attributes), as the later wasn’t used by the catalog.
trans-unit.target: . The responsibility for parsing and skipping the query has moved into the catalog, and the return value no longer has to be a tuple of (result, used_attributes), as the later wasn’t used by the catalog.

trans-unit.source: . This allows the index to apply its optimizations, while objects with values outside this range can still be stored in a normal date index, which omits explicitly passed in
trans-unit.target: . This allows the index to apply its optimizations, while objects with values outside this range can still be stored in a normal date index, which omits explicitly passed in

trans-unit.source: Adapt remaining ZMI tabs to Bootstrap (#45)
trans-unit.target: Adapt remaining ZMI tabs to Bootstrap (#45)

trans-unit.source: Adapt the ZMI HTML to the new Bootstrap ZMI. (#41)
trans-unit.target: Adapt the ZMI HTML to the new Bootstrap ZMI. (#41)

trans-unit.source: Add a new getCounter method to indices.
trans-unit.target: 在indices中增加一个新的getCounter方法。
在configure.zcml中添加已废弃的ManageAddDelete指令。

trans-unit.source: Add new IQueryIndex interface for indices. This introduces a new
trans-unit.target: 为指数添加新的IQueryIndex接口。这引入了一个新的

trans-unit.source: Add new precision property to date and date range indexes. This lets you index more coarse grained time values instead of the default one minute based time resolution.
trans-unit.target: 为日期和日期范围索引添加新的精度属性。这让你可以索引更多粗粒度的时间值,而不是默认的基于一分钟的时间分辨率。

trans-unit.source: Added a floor and ceiling value to the date range index. Values outside the specified range will be interpreted the same way as passing
trans-unit.target: Acrescentou um valor de piso e tecto ao índice do intervalo de datas.Os valores fora do intervalo especificado serão interpretados da mesma forma que a passagem

trans-unit.source: Added a new UUIDIndex, based on the common UnIndex. It behaves like a FieldIndex, but can only store one document id per value, so there’s a 1:1 mapping from value to document id. An error is logged if a different document id is indexed for an already taken value. The internal data structures are optimized for this and avoid storing one IITreeSet per value.
trans-unit.target: Added a new UUIDIndex, based on the common UnIndex. It behaves like a FieldIndex, but can only store one document id per value, so there’s a 1:1 mapping from value to document id. An error is logged if a different document id is indexed for an already taken value. The internal data structures are optimized for this and avoid storing one IITreeSet per value.

trans-unit.source: Added automatic sorting limit calculation based on batch arguments. If the query contains a
trans-unit.target: 增加了基于批次参数的自动排序限制计算。如果查询包含一个

trans-unit.source: Added reporting of the intersection time of each index’ result with the result set of the other indexes and consider this time to be part of each index time for prioritizing the index.
trans-unit.target: Added reporting of the intersection time of each index’ result with the result set of the other indexes and consider this time to be part of each index time for prioritizing the index.

trans-unit.source: Added support for using ZCatalog as local utility. This feature requires the optional
trans-unit.target: 增加了对使用ZCatalog作为本地工具的支持。这个功能需要可选的

trans-unit.source: As part of each progress handler report, also do an automatic transaction savepoint, to give the ZODB cache a chance to do garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 作为每个进度处理程序报告的一部分,也要做一个自动事务保存点,给ZODB缓存做垃圾回收的机会。
避免局部依赖性测试条件

trans-unit.source: Avoid pre-allocation of marker items in
trans-unit.target: 避免预先分配标记项目

trans-unit.source: Code cleanup and completion of TopicIndex according to existing index methods and properties (#65)
trans-unit.target: Code cleanup and completion of TopicIndex according to existing index methods and properties (#65)

trans-unit.source: Empty catalog queries now return no results.
trans-unit.target: 空目录查询现在不会返回结果。

trans-unit.source: Expand query report, to cover details on sort indexes, order and limits.
trans-unit.target: 扩展查询报告,涵盖排序索引、顺序和限制的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: Extend BooleanIndex by making the indexed value variable instead of hardcoding it to
trans-unit.target: Ampliar o BooleanIndex tornando a variável de valor indexado em vez de o codificar em

trans-unit.source: Extend IQueryIndex interface to handle operator parsing.
trans-unit.target: 扩展IQueryIndex接口来处理运算符解析。

trans-unit.source: Fix “invalid escape sequence” warning in Python 3.
trans-unit.target: Fix “invalid escape sequence” warning in Python 3.

trans-unit.source: Fix BooleanIndex when index inversion occurs as a result of reindexing and existing document with the opposite value. Fixes LP #1236354.
trans-unit.target: Fix BooleanIndex when index inversion occurs as a result of reindexing and existing document with the opposite value. Fixes LP #1236354.

trans-unit.source: Fix a TypeError on Python 3 when trying to lookup in an OOBTree a value for a key that has an invalid type. (#36)
trans-unit.target: Fix a TypeError on Python 3 when trying to lookup in an OOBTree a value for a key that has an invalid type. (#36)

trans-unit.source: Fix a bug in the BooleanIndex where documents without an entry in the index were not being filtered out in all queries.
trans-unit.target: 修复了BooleanIndex中的一个bug,即在所有查询中,索引中没有条目的文档不会被过滤掉。

trans-unit.source: Fix exception happening when reindexing multiple indexes while having a progress handler. (#89)
trans-unit.target: Fix exception happening when reindexing multiple indexes while having a progress handler. (#89)

trans-unit.source: Fix rewriting of query to avoid wrong optimization of CompositeIndex. (#59)
trans-unit.target: Fix rewriting of query to avoid wrong optimization of CompositeIndex. (#59)

trans-unit.source: Fix sorting of index overview table in ZMI. Migrated the template from to zpt. (#62)
trans-unit.target: Fix sorting of index overview table in ZMI. Migrated the template from to zpt. (#62)
用Python 3.8修复。替换掉已废弃的

trans-unit.source: Fixed BooleanIndex’ items method so the ZMI browse view works.
trans-unit.target: Fixed BooleanIndex’ items method so the ZMI browse view works.

trans-unit.source: Fixed addition of two LazyCat’s if any of them was already flattened.
trans-unit.target: Fixed addition of two LazyCat’s if any of them was already flattened.

trans-unit.source: Fixed another issue with preserving score values, when a custom index was queried first which was neither ILimitedResultIndex aware nor return scores, and a later index was of the default ZCTextIndex type.
trans-unit.target: 修正了另一个保留分数值的问题,当先查询一个既不知道ILimitedResultIndex,也不返回分数的自定义索引,而后来的索引是默认的ZCTextIndex类型。

trans-unit.source: Fixed bug in date range index, which would omit objects exactly matching the query term if a resultset was provided.
trans-unit.target: Corrigido o erro no índice do intervalo de datas,que omitiria objectos exactamente correspondentes ao termo de consulta se fosse fornecido um conjunto de resultados.

trans-unit.source: Fixed incorrect calculation of batches in the second half of the result set in sortResults.
trans-unit.target: 修正了sortResults中结果集后半部分的批次计算不正确的问题。
Falhas fixas nos testes introduzidas em 2.13.4.

trans-unit.source: Fixed the BooleanIndex to not index objects without the cataloged attribute.
trans-unit.target: Fixou o BooleanIndex para não indexar objectos sem o atributo catalogado.

trans-unit.source: Fixed undefined variables in BooleanIndex inline migration code.
trans-unit.target: Variáveis fixas não definidas no código de migração em linha BooleanIndex.

trans-unit.source: Forward compatibility for Zope 4 removal of RequestContainer.
If batching arguments are provided, limit the returned lazy sequence to the items in the required batch instead of returning leading items falling outside of the requested batch.
trans-unit.target: Se forem apresentados argumentos de lote,limitar a sequência preguiçosa devolvida aos artigos do lote requerido,em vez de devolver artigos principais que não pertençam ao lote requerido.

trans-unit.source: In the path index, don’t update data if the value hasn’t changed.
trans-unit.target: In the path index, don’t update data if the value hasn’t changed.

trans-unit.source: In the string representation of a catalog plan, round the times to at most two digits after the comma.
trans-unit.target: 在目录计划的字符串表示中,将次数最多四舍五入到逗号后的两位数。

trans-unit.source: Increase plan precision to 4 digits in its string representation.
trans-unit.target: 在其字符串表示中,将计划精度提高到4位。

trans-unit.source: It comes with a variety of indexes for different types of data.
trans-unit.target: 它为不同类型的数据配备了多种索引。

trans-unit.source: LP #727981: Fix DateIndex ZMI browsing for dates in the first month of a year.
trans-unit.target: LP #727981:修正DateIndex ZMI浏览一年中第一个月的日期。

trans-unit.source: Make sure WidCode decode handles bytes that were improperly converted from Python 2 to Python 3.
trans-unit.target: 确保 WidCode 解码处理从 Python 2 转换到 Python 3 的字节不正确。

trans-unit.source: No longer special-case empty strings in catalog queries.
trans-unit.target: 在目录查询中不再特写空字符串。

trans-unit.source: No longer try to insert a None value into a field index in tests.
trans-unit.target: 不再尝试在测试中的字段索引中插入None值。

trans-unit.source: Optimize DateRangeIndex for better conflict resolution handling. It always starts out with storing an IITreeSet of the value instead of special casing storing an int for a single value. The
trans-unit.target: Optimize o DateRangeIndex para um melhor tratamento da resolução de conflitos.Começa sempre por armazenar um IITreeSet do valor em vez de um invólucro especial que armazena uma int por um único valor.O

trans-unit.source: Optimize brain instantiation, by creating underlying record items in a single step, instead of creation and three update calls.
trans-unit.target: 优化大脑实例化,通过单步创建底层记录项,而不是创建和三次更新调用。

trans-unit.source: Optimize sorting in presence of batching arguments. If a batch from the end of the result set is requested, we internally reverse the sorting order and at the end reverse the lazy sequence again. In a sequence with 100 entries, if we request the batch with items 80 to 90, we now reverse sort 20 items (100 to 80), slice of the first ten items and then reverse them. Before we would had to sort the first 90 items and then slice of the last 10.
trans-unit.target: Optimizar a classificação em presença de argumentos de lotes.Se for solicitado um lote a partir do final do conjunto de resultados,invertemos internamente a ordem de classificação e no final invertemos novamente a sequência preguiçosa.Numa sequência com 100 entradas,se solicitarmos o lote com itens 80 a 90,revertemos agora a ordenação de 20 itens (100 a 80),cortamos os primeiros dez itens e depois revertêmo-los.Antes,teríamos de ordenar os primeiros 90 itens e,em seguida,cortar os últimos 10.

trans-unit.source: Optimized length calculation of Lazy classes.
Prevent the new UUIDIndex from acquiring attributes via Acquisition.
trans-unit.target: Impedir a nova UUIDIndex de adquirir atributos através da Aquisição.

trans-unit.source: Raise BadRequest instead of returning MessageDialog.
Raise a TypeError when trying to index or lookup
trans-unit.target: 当尝试索引或查找时,会引发类型错误。

trans-unit.source: Refactored value index logic. Determine value indexes per catalog instead of globally. Store value index set in the priority map, so it can be seen in the ZMI and stored in the module level storage.
trans-unit.target: 重构价值索引逻辑。确定每个目录的价值索引,而不是全局。在优先级地图中存储价值索引集,因此可以在ZMI中看到并存储在模块级存储中。
以单独发行的方式发行。

trans-unit.source: Remove CatalogSearchArgumentsMap and support for using requests objects as queries.
trans-unit.target: 删除CatalogSearchArgumentsMap和对使用请求对象作为查询的支持。
删除废弃的目录(路径)认知模块。

trans-unit.source: Remove docstrings from various methods, as they shouldn’t be web-publishable.
trans-unit.target: Remove docstrings from various methods, as they shouldn’t be web-publishable.

trans-unit.source: Removed tracking of result length from the query plan. The calculation of the length of an intermediate index result can itself be expensive.
trans-unit.target: Removido o rastreio da duração do resultado do plano de consulta.O cálculo da duração de um resultado de índice intermédio pode,por si só,ser caro.

trans-unit.source: Restore ability for indexes to use extra query params. See PR #1.
trans-unit.target: 恢复索引使用额外查询参数的能力。参见PR #1。

trans-unit.source: Restored preserving score values from ZCTextIndex indices. https://bugs.launchpad.net/zope2/+bug/815469
trans-unit.target: Restored preserving score values from ZCTextIndex indices. https://bugs.launchpad.net/zope2/+bug/815469

trans-unit.source: Strip white space from name when adding a column or index.
trans-unit.target: 当添加列或索引时,从名称中去掉空白。

trans-unit.source: Substitute catalog entry in UUIDIndex error message.
trans-unit.target: Entrada de catálogo substituta na mensagem de erro UUIDIndex.

trans-unit.source: Target use with Zope 4: no longer support 2.13.x.
The ZCatalog is Zope’s built in search engine. It allows you to categorize and search all kinds of Zope objects.
trans-unit.target: The ZCatalog is Zope’s built in search engine. It allows you to categorize and search all kinds of Zope objects.

Update to ZODB 4.0 as direct dependency.
Updated deprecation warnings to point to Zope 4 instead of 2.14.

trans-unit.source: Use aq_inner before aq_parent at some places to safely get the parent.
trans-unit.target: 在某些地方使用aq_inner在aq_parent之前,可以安全地得到父函数。
